title: Not worth what I paid for
review: The wick was covered in wax. I had to get it out with a knife. I lit it up and it wouldn't stay lit because of the wax accumulating around the wick so there was basically never a flame but a little bit of blue light before it would extinguish. Never again.

title: Smells like Gasoline. Manufacturer replacing.
review:
UPDATED: Amazon advised I'd have to contact the manufacturer (Yankee Candle) directly as it was past the return date. They were very helpful.
They are sending me a replacement, however, there may be duties on it when it arrives due to it shipping from the US. Will update again when I receive the candle. If the duties are high, I'll have to contact them again for a better solution as I'm not paying more money for a new candle when it's supposed to be replaced at no cost to me. The candle smelling like gas was in no way my fault.
---
I was smelling the scent of gasoline in my office; I don't have any gas appliances and u checked my furnace. I've lite the candle only a few times and decided I should smell it because, who knows, maybe it's the candle. Shockingly it was! Pure gasoline.

Very dissapointed as Yankee candles are not cheap and I now have a full French Vanilla Gasoline candle that I can't burn and paid almost $40 for.

title: Disappointing lack of scent
review: This has no vanilla scent. Previously I purchased the pine scent and it was fantastic. This vanilla one doesn‚Äôt have any smell and is very disappointing. For the price of a Yankee Candle, I expect high quality and a good scent.

title: You're not going to smell it
review: It's a really nice candle and it looks like it's going to last me a long time, but the scent is weak. You're only really going to smell it when you're very close. I live in a tiny apartment and it's still not filling the room I'm in let alone the rest of the apartment. It has a nice slow burn though, so I know it'll last me, I just wish the smell was stronger.

title: Nice scent

title: There's no scent.
review: I'm a Yankee Candle OG, this is the first candle I've had with zero scent. No value.

title: No bang for your buck - smell is too faint
review: I would not recommend this particular scent from this brand. I have tried other Yankee Candles and the smell always circulates nicely in the kitchen/living room due to the size and potency of these candles. French Vanilla, however, is such a faint scent and the room barely smelled like it. If I'm spending nearly $40 on a candle, I expect the scent to be very strong and spread throughout at least one room. I'm pretty disappointed with this purchase.

title: Great quality
review: Recieved it finally

title: Broken -Update
review: I'm updating this review as although we received the candle cracked, we were automatically refunded within a week. The candle itself smells lovely, so we will definitely try to buy it again. Thank you!

title: Amazing smell, would purchase again
review: When I first ordered this candle I was scared because of the reviews saying it smelt like nothing, however, as soon as I lit this candle it gave my room a nice sweet smell that wasn't overbearing. My room is in the basement so within half an hour you could smell the candle from the stairs. My family loves the smell this candle gives off and I could recommend this to anyone.

title: Very weak fragance
review: I don't get how Yankee Candle is a market leader. The scent is very weak, barely perceptible compared with other scented candles. On the plus side, the candle does burn for a long time. Still not worth $35.

title: No scent?
review: I always thought Yankee Candles were low quality based on my own previous experiences with them, but everyone loves them so much and this product got rave reviews (which I read to ensure they suited my needs), so I figured the formula must have changed over the years and I should give them another shot. Especially because everyone commented on the scent of this candle and I am a vanilla die-hard. But there is no scent to this candle at all, and it isn't a faulty candle - this is just how Yankee Candles are, in my every experience. I left this candle on for *hours*, but I couldn't smell anything, so left the room and came back after about a half hour, and still no scent. Save your money, there are plenty better candles on Amazon, or take a quick trip to Bath and Body Works. Those candles fill up my room with delicious scents within minutes.

title: Quick delivery and cheaper than at the store
review: Quick delivery and cheaper than going to the store to purchase. Absolutely love this candle - light it every time we use the deep fryer and the scent is strong enough to cut through the grease smell but not so strong that it causes headaches.

title: Like the scent but don't burn evenly
review: There definitely is a difference parrafin and soy wax. I am an avid candle user and will spend the money on a good candle but was disappointed with the burn. Maybe it needs 2 wicks. I have many Yankee candles and it seems like they have changed their wicks. If you don't trim them they are smokey. I do like their scents though so I end up scraping the sides of wax and put that it a warmer and also when it won't light anymore but there is still wax I put the whole jar in a warmer. For that price I don't want to waste any.

title: This should never have been sold
review:
I knew there was some damage, but not smashed. Who at Amazon thought this could be resold? Disgusting! I had broken glass all over my counter top. This was dangerous and irresponsible. The jar itself was smashed. No way it was useable. I am very upset. I will never buy a returned item again. I was very lucky not to be cut.
An imperfection, OK. The discount accounts for that. Garbage? Criminal.
Is Amazon too busy now to do things right?

1 recommendation - if you buy a lot of these types of candles, invest in a wick trimmer (amazon has a bunch) ... keeping the wick nice a trimmed will prevent soot getting on the side of the jar as it burns down.
Will buy again.

title: Both Chocolate Layer Cake AND Pumpkin Apple Parfait smell wonderful
review:
I've had Chocolate Layer Cake before years ago and it was a favourite then. I hadn't had any in years, since Yankee stopped shipping to Canada.

But when I saw it on Amazon, I ordered one. It smells, as I said in the title, very much just as good as I remember it. Just delicious chocolate cake. You can smell both the cake and the rich icing And it just smells chocolatey and wonderful.

It's burning well too.

I found that these desserty candles almost just as good as eating actual cake. I actually use them as a diet aid. I light one up each day, take a few deep breaths, mediate, read and relax for a few hours. It leads to less actual cravings for desserts as I feel like I'm already having the experience of it each day.

Chocolate just makes me happy. And this is a really nice chocolate

As for the Pumpkin Apple Parfait, I just tried it for the first time and loveit too.

It has a beautiful apple scent. I then do smell a vanilla/caramelly scent. And then there is some pumpkin in there too. Although the cent of this one faded quite a bit afew days in But overall, I'm happy with this one too. Both smell delicious

title: Very disappointed
review: I was looking forward to this candle for 6 months ,got amazon card for my birthday and ordered it ..Yankee Candles were my favorite ,The smell of the chocolate cake was not the smell of chocolate cake ..I burned it for a while and still not smelling like chocolate cake ..I was thinking maybe sat on shelf for years ..Don't know .But will not be ordering any again.

title: Yankee never disappoints
review: This candle arrived very securely packaged all intact. As usual Yankee Candles never disappoint me. Descent appears to be absolutely awesome. Looking forward to burning it at Christmas time. The fragrance seems spot on for mistletoe. You could never go wrong with a Yankee candle. Highly recommended.

I'm annoyed and frustrated. I've bought other candles from this company and they are amazing. it's just disappointing that for whatever reason I never got the chance to try this one.

title: Authentic, Lovely, Cozy.
review: Lovely. I‚Äôve ordered Yankee candles straight from their website before and have found that certain scents are not as ‚Äústrong‚Äù as others. Does not mean they are not authentic, it depends on the candle you purchase. This candle is a potent, lovely scent that fills the room, but not too strong as I find BBW candles. It came in original Yankee Candle packaging as well, so no need to worry about the authenticity, it is the real deal. I love the fresh clean scent of this candle, perfect for gifting or keeping for yourself. Will be ordering more :)

title: 5 Stars if you like men's cologne
review: I gave it 5 Stars because the scent is clean and really fills the room. I picked it based on the name and my love of the moon, but I forgot to read about the smell and I hate it, but that's my fault. It's like men's cologne. If that's what you're looking for, it's a great candle.

title: Used to hate it - Now I love it
review: I know people say that this smells like men's Axe, but it actually has a clean linen smell thats musky and masculine. It smells so SEXY. Smelling this, makes me feel like I am in a fresh clean bed always!

title: Yankee Candle Company Clean Cotton Large Jar Candle
review: Great candle, great scent and fragrance, and long lasting, and even burning. Love Yankee Candles for the quality. I have tried many other candles, and none can hold a flame to the Yankee Candle.... (pun intended).

title: Lacking scent?

These candles are wonderful if you get one that has enough scent to it.

title: The best scent yet!

I loved this so much that my last order was a Christmas present for some of my friends and family. Please keep this scent available.....it's a keeper!
